member.name: T:Facebook.NetCore.HttpClient.ExtensionMethods.FacebookHttpClientExtensionMethods
member.summary: Extensions methods for the FacebookHttpClient class.
Send a Facebook format GET request to the specified Uri with an HTTP completion option and a cancellation token as an asynchronous operation.
member.param: The dictionary of arguments to pass.
An HTTP completion option value that indicates when the operation should be considered completed.
A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.returns: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

member.name: M:Facebook.NetCore.HttpClient.ExtensionMethods.FacebookHttpClientExtensionMethods.PostAsync(Facebook.NetCore.HttpClient.FacebookHttpClient,System.String,System.Net.Http.HttpContent,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.String},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Send a POST request with a cancellation token as an asynchronous operation.
member.param: The HttpContent to pass in the request.
The dictionary of arguments to pass.
A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.returns: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.
